com.epoch.constants
Interface CharConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharReencoder
public interface CharConstants

Holds constants used for CharReencoder functions.

Field Summary
static byte[] BITS
          Masks for bits 0-7.
static int LATIN1
          Value for stringType.
static String LATIN1_SET
          The Latin-1 character set that we use to convert Strings to bytes and vice versa.
static int[] MS1252_RANGE
          Range of nonstandard MS Windows 1252 code points.
static int[] MS1252_TO_STD
          Standard HTML code points for MS Windows 1252 characters 130-159, using a space character as a placeholder for invalid code points.

          Value for stringType.
static int UTF8
          Value for stringType.

MS1252_TO_STD

static final int[] MS1252_TO_STD
